000: Almost all the buildings of the former coalmine have a new destination. An exception is this building where coal was loaded on trains.
001: There is not much to see in the building, concrete everywhere.
003: This is the back side of the building. Here there are some pipes and a water tower.
006: The reservoirs are made tight to liquid with a tar-like substance
007: In the same forest a storage tank.
009: The last picture. The forest was difficult to walk through, or actually move through. Nettles and brambles up to my waist everywhere, while being attacked by all kinds of insects.
